sections.heading: from state treasury; specific sums
sections.text: All appropriations of money from the state treasury, whether such money is derived from the levy of state taxes or from any other source, shall be by the appropriation of specific sums.SourceLaws 1921, c. 24, ยง 1, p. 150;C.S.1922, ยง 6228;C.S.1929, ยง 77-2617;R.S.194
